sequenceDiagram title Create From External Intermediate DID Document participant Controller participant BTC1Create participant Encode as Identifier Encoding participant Canonicalize as Canonicalize & Hash note over Controller, Canonicalize: Offline — no Bitcoin network interaction Controller->>BTC1Create: CreateExternal(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) BTC1Create->>BTC1Create: idType="external"
version=1
network="bitcoin" BTC1Create->>Canonicalize: CanonicalizeAndHash(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) Canonicalize-->>BTC1Create: genesisBytes BTC1Create->>Encode: Encode(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) Encode-->>BTC1Create: id BTC1Create->>BTC1Create: initialDocument = copy(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
